title: Computer fraud in the second degree
context: ยง708-891.5 Computer fraud in the second degree. (1) A person commits the offense of computer fraud in the second degree if the person knowingly accesses a computer, computer system, or computer network with the intent to commit the offense of theft in the second degree. (2) Computer fraud in the second degree is a class B felony. [L 2001, c 33, pt of ยง1; am L 2012, c 293, ยง3]
